Original: Ah, yes, that request. The client is
here in this establishment now, so
you may ask him for more details.
[Page]
He is an interesting one. He claims
to be a farming explorer who has seen
many sights. I hope you can help him.
Translation: Ah, yes, that request. The client is
here in this establishment now, so
you may ask him for more details.
[Page]
He is an interesting one. He claims
to be a farming explorer who has seen
many sights. I hope you can help him.

Original: You have done well indeed to find the
Finest Plains. It seems that the
client's journey has borne fruit.
[Page]
But a farmer and an explorer...?
What an odd combination. Well, as they
say, "When in Armoroad..."
[Page]
I would like to see his homeland for
myself sometime. But enough of that!
Here is your promised reward.
Translation: You have done well indeed to find the
Finest Plains. It seems that the
client's journey has borne fruit.
[Page]
But a farmer and an explorer...?
What an odd combination. Well, as they
say, "When in Armoroad..."
[Page]
I would like to see his homeland for
myself sometime. But enough of that!
Here is your promised reward.

Original: You detect a sweet, fragrant scent of
grass wafting from somewhere.
[Page]
You look down and discover that the
fruity bouquet is arising from the
green fields below.
[Page]
This must be the place where the
client said the best feed could be
gathered... the [Color:5]Finest Plains[Color:0]!
[Page]
You should return to the bar and
give the eager farmer their location.
Then the request will be complete!
Translation: You detect a sweet, fragrant scent of
grass wafting from somewhere.
[Page]
You look down and discover that the
fruity bouquet is arising from the
green fields below.
[Page]
This must be the place where the
client said the best feed could be
gathered... the [Color:5]Finest Plains[Color:0]!
[Page]
You should return to the bar and
give the eager farmer their location.
Then the request will be complete!

Original: Below you, the Finest Plains give off
their sweet scent...
Translation: Below you, the Finest Plains give off
their sweet scent...
